positions.title: Software Engineer — DevOps & Cloud Infrastructure
description: Architected a 99.99% available multi-tenant FTP ingress platform using SFTP-gateway and automated cloud provisioning
Led ClickOps to Terraform transformation for all AWS assets, reducing TTR by 40%
Redesigned GitHub Actions pipelines with semantic versioning and parallelized testing, increasing engineering velocity by 30%
Reduced AWS spend by 40% (~$40k annually) using Fargate Spot, Savings Plans, and right-sizing
Implemented service-level observability with Prometheus and Grafana for improved incident triage
Built a real-time data lakehouse (ELT) using Dagster, DLT, and ClickHouse, reducing query latency from minutes to milliseconds
Executed zero-downtime Auth0 tenant migration for 1,000+ users and enforced least-privilege IAM policies via AWS SSO

positions.title: Analyst Trainee — Cloud & DevOps
description: Refactored monolithic CI/CD pipelines into modular stages, increasing success rates by 15%
Integrated Prometheus alerting with Slack, reducing incident response time by 20%

positions.title: Software Engineer — DevSecOps
description: Embedded security gates in AWS CodeBuild, preventing 95% of critical CVEs
Migrated logging storage to AWS EFS, improving query performance by 30%

positions.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Automated CI/CD workflows in Azure DevOps and improved front-end performance using ReactJS
